cause.description:
A very rare, very aggressive often non responsive to treatment cancer. If found in lungs,5 year survival rate for this if found in lungs is less than 10 percent, one year is only 20 percent. Because of it being rare not alot of information in medical research is available comparatively to some other cancers.
1. More research is necessary to save lives.
2. People need to provide permission for research.
cause.name: Sarcomatoid Carcinoma
